light.description: Controls the light device, including turning it on/off, adjusting brightness, and setting color.

methods.name: turn_on
methods.description: Turn on the light.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the light device.

methods.name: turn_off
methods.description: Turn off the light.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the light device.

methods.name: get_brightness
methods.description: Get the current brightness level of the light.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the light device.

methods.name: set_brightness
methods.description: Set the brightness level of the light.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the light device.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: The brightness level to set (0-100).

methods.name: set_color
methods.description: Set the color of the light.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the light device.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color to set (options: Warm White, Cool White, Red, Blue).

air_conditioner.description: Controls the air conditioner device, including turning it on/off, setting temperature, and adjusting mode.

methods.name: turn_on
methods.description: Turn on the air conditioner.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the air conditioner device.

methods.name: turn_off
methods.description: Turn off the air conditioner.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the air conditioner device.

methods.name: get_temperature
methods.description: Get the current temperature of the air conditioner.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the air conditioner device.

methods.name: set_temperature
methods.description: Set the temperature of the air conditioner.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the air conditioner device.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The temperature value to set.

methods.name: set_mode
methods.description: Set the mode of the air conditioner.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the air conditioner device.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set (options: cooling, heating, fan).

tv.description: Controls the TV device, including turning it on/off, setting channel, and adjusting volume.

methods.name: turn_on
methods.description: Turn on the TV.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TV device.

methods.name: turn_off
methods.description: Turn off the TV.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TV device.

methods.name: set_channel
methods.description: Set the TV channel.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TV device.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel number to set (options: 1-10).

methods.name: set_volume
methods.description: Set the TV volume.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TV device.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: The volume value to set (options: 0-100).

methods.name: get_volume
methods.description: Get the current volume of the TV.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TV device.

audio_player.description: Controls the audio player device, including turning it on/off, adjusting volume, and playing music.

methods.name: turn_on
methods.description: Turn on the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

methods.name: turn_off
methods.description: Turn off the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

methods.name: set_volume
methods.description: Set the volume of the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: The volume value to set (0-100).

methods.name: get_volume
methods.description: Get the current volume of the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

methods.name: play_music
methods.description: Play music on the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

parameters.name: song
parameters.description: The title of the song to play.

methods.name: stop_music
methods.description: Stop playing music on the audio player.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the audio player device.

curtain.description: Controls the curtain device, including opening/closing it and setting its position.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Open the curtain.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the curtain device.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Close the curtain.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the curtain device.

methods.name: set_position
methods.description: Set the position of the curtain.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the curtain device.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position value to set (options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).

methods.name: get_position
methods.description: Get the current position of the curtain.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the curtain device.
